question: What are the UX items discussed?
What are the UX items discussed?

added: Dark theme: Mike suggests using a dark theme for the user interface, as it is trendy and reduces eye strain for users.

Websockets (mentioned but not agreed upon): Sara suggests using websockets to improve latency and provide real-time updates, but Mike proposes holding off on this feature for now due to the amount of work involved.
removed: Desktop-first approach: John suggests focusing on desktop first, as their primary users will be using the product on desktops. Sara and Mike agree with this change.
modified: Modular design: John suggests using a modular design for the product, which will allow for easy addition or removal of features as needed.
